title: Matrimonio a prima vista Italia
overview: The social experiment arrives in which six singles will choose to marry with perfect strangers met for the first time at the altar. With the help of the team of experts composed by the sexologist Nada Loffredi, the sociologist Mario Abis and the couple psychotherapist Fabrizio Quattrini, the three couples will then choose, after the marriage and a cohabitation of five weeks if they stay together or ask for a divorce.
